name: MLCPoolingDescriptor
desc: A configuration object you use to create a pooling layer.

items.name: init(type: MLCPoolingType, kernelSizes: (height: Int, width: Int), strides: (y: Int, x: Int), dilationRates: (y: Int, x: Int), paddingPolicy: MLCPaddingPolicy)
items.desc: Creates a pooling descriptor with the pooling function type, kernel sizes, strides, dilation rates, and padding policy that you specify.

items.name: var kernelSizes: (height: Int, width: Int)
items.desc: A tuple that contains the kernel sizes for height and width.

items.name: var strides: (y: Int, x: Int)
items.desc: A tuple that contains the kernel strides for y and x.

items.name: var dilationRates: (y: Int, x: Int)
items.desc: A tuple that contains the dilation rates for y and x.
